channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for MA
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for MA

item.description:
Report X-2024020585

  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0

  • Description: DURING CLEAN UP AND INSPECTION, RESPONDER DISCOVERED PACKAGE HAD LOOSE CAPS ON BOTTLES AND PROCESSED THROUGH DMP.

item.title: Report X-2024020146
item.description:
Report X-2024020146

Identified by scraper @ 2024-02-12T18:12:40+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-02-01
  • City: SHREWSBURY
  • State: MA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE CO
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: 1. X-2024020146 LEAKING HAZARDOUS MATERIAL WAS FOUND IN THE UNLOAD. PACKAGE WAS CONTAINED AND BROUGHT TO THE DMP USING THE DECISION TREE FOR CORROSIVE MATERIALS. PACKAGE WAS PROCESSED USING THE DECISION TREE FOR CORROSIVE LIQUIDS. 2. X-2024020147 LEAKING HAZARDOUS MATERIAL FOUND IN THE UNLOAD. PACKAGE WAS CONTAINED BY RESPONDER AND BROUGHT TO THE DMP USING THE DECISION TREE FOR CORROSIVE LIQUIDS. PACKAGE WAS PROCESSED USING THE DECISION TREE FOR CORROSIVE LIQUIDS. 3. X-2024020148 LEAKING HAZARDOUS MATERIAL FOUND IN THE UNLOAD. PACKAGE CONTAINED BY RESPONDER AND BROUGHT TO THE DMP USING THE DECISION TREE FOR CORROSIVE LIQUIDS.

item.title: Report X-2024020358
item.description:
Report X-2024020358

Identified by scraper @ 2024-02-16T00:33:09+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-01-18
  • City: NORTH BILLERICA
  • State: MA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: PKG CAME IN FROM UNLOAD AND BROUGHT TO QA. PKG WAS WET AND LEAKING LIQUID. PLACED IN A HAZMAT BAG AND RED TOTE. DescribePack: PKG WAS FOUND TO HAVE LOOSENED CAP ON 1 OUT OF 4 BOTTLES. BOTTLE WAS EMPTY FROM SPILLAGE. DurationRel: 2 and MitigateEffect: PLACED UPRIGHT INSIDE HAZMAT BAG AND RED HAZMAT TOTE

item.description:
Report X-2024020522

  • City: WILMINGTON

  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Package discovered leaking. Placed in hazmat bin and taken to fume hood in hazmat cage. DescribePack: Leakage from cap. Liquid spilled down the side of the container and soaked the box. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Placed in plastic hazmat bin.

item.title: Report X-2024020099
item.description:
Report X-2024020099

Identified by scraper @ 2024-02-12T18:12:40+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-01-24
  • City: LYNNFIELD
  • State: MA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: THE PACKAGE WAS UNLOADED, PALED AND SENT TO THE SORT AISLE AND SORTED INTO THE BOXLINE. THE PRELOADER NOTICED IT WAS LEAKING. HE LEFT THE AREA AND NOTIFIED HIS SUPERVISOR. THE SUPERVISOR THEN CALLED FOR A DESIGNATED RESPONDER. THE RESPONDER, FOLLWING THE DECISION TREE AND APPROPRIATE RESPONCE SHEET, PLACED THE PACKAGE INTO A LINED SPILL TUB. THE EQUIPMENT WAS CLEANED FOLLOWING THE EQUIPMENT DECONTAMINATION CHECKLIST. THE PACKAGE WAS THEN TRANSPORTED TO THE DMP AREA FOR FUTHER PROCESSING. IT WAS THEN, THE PACKAGE WAS DISCOVERED TO BE UNDECLARED.
